I bought a 2t for my lil man & a 3t for his twin who is 5 lbs bigger. & they seemed shrink a tad in the wash, which is why I got them bigger sizes, they are adorable shirts for a great price. & still pretty big on my lil guys. But fits nice & loose, & are comfy enough to lounge around in at home w/ breathable cotton fabric that is soft & cute at the same time. The print is even & still holding up after 4 washes already. I do let them air dry if it's cotton. My boy (in the photo) is 10 months old, & 27 lbs. He is already too big for the 18/24 month clothing. So I skipped a size (in case of shrinkage) & got him a 3t & it's perfect!
